about.description: üíª Hello! I'm Pablo Gomes, a Front-end Developer specialized in React, TypeScript and creating modern interfaces.
about.journey: My previous experience in the industrial area gave me a unique perspective: meticulous attention to detail, organization and efficiency - skills that I apply directly to interface development. Today, I channel this experience to create dynamic, accessible and visually impactful web experiences.
about.education: I'm currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at UNIP, with specialized focus on front-end technologies and modern web development best practices.
